about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the Vikings: Sex and Blood world with the Original Soundtrack created by Syn. 

Mute the in game music and play just the tracks that you like the most, and also gain access to 3 tracks that are not in the game. 

Support the artist directly, all the sales revenue will go directly to the artist.
